venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description:
What is the Spiritual Community Gathering?

It is a supportive and informative evening of spiritual and intellectual discussion.  Come to ask questions, share experiences and learn more about the spiritual world around you.  Discussions vary each week, from energetics to what is happening on the other side.  The Gathering welcomes all levels of spirituality, from beginners to seasoned path walkers, all coming together in a fun and thoughtful environment.  Over the years the Community Gatherings have provided many with the support needed to follow their own unique spiritual path.

All belief systems welcomed.  Your group facilitator will be Isabeau Esby, Life Path Psychic Medium.

Registration is NOT required, drop ins absolutely welcome, open to the public

Weekly attendance not required, please arrive on time

Cost - $10 suggested donation
item.how_to_find_us: from I-95, take exit 3 to Route 33 West The Center is located 2.6 miles on the right at the corner of 33 and Bayside
item.why: Come with an open mind. Learn, laugh and love. Leave with something to think about!
item.name: Spiritual Community Gatherings with Isabeau Esby
